ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.12.* *_cpython
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
This package only provides a query interface for `GET` requests for a
subset of information available from a DQSegDB server.
Any users wishing to make `POST` requests should refer to the official
DQSegDB Python client available from https://pypi.org/project/dqsegdb.
about.summary: A simplified Python implementation of the DQSegDB API

about.description:
This package only provides a query interface for `GET` requests for a
subset of information available from a DQSegDB server.
Any users wishing to make `POST` requests should refer to the official
DQSegDB Python client available from https://pypi.org/project/dqsegdb.
about.summary: A simplified Python implementation of the DQSegDB API

name: dqsegdb2
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "dqsegdb2" %}
{% set version = "1.3.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 4e291899cd395daf5913c48a835d213ef20833d78354871cb848988cc2cc8ae4

build:
  entry_points:
    - dqsegdb2 = dqsegdb2.cli:cli
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools >=69.3.0
    - setuptools-scm >=3.4.3
  run:
    - click >=6.7
    - igwn-auth-utils >=1.0.0
    - igwn-segments >=2.0.0
    - python >={{ python_min }}

test:
  requires:
    - pip
    - pytest >=2.9.2
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - requests-mock >=1.5.0
  commands:
    # check metadata
    - python -m pip check
    - python -m pip show dqsegdb2
    # run test suite
    - python -m pytest --pyargs dqsegdb2 -ra -v
    # check CLI
    - dqsegdb2 --help
    - dqsegdb2 query --help

about:
  home: https://dqsegdb2.readthedocs.io
  doc_url: https://dqsegdb2.readthedocs.io
  dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/computing/software/dqsegdb2.git
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: A simplified Python implementation of the DQSegDB API
  description: |
    This package only provides a query interface for `GET` requests for a
    subset of information available from a DQSegDB server.
    Any users wishing to make `POST` requests should refer to the official
    DQSegDB Python client available from https://pypi.org/project/dqsegdb.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - duncanmmacleod
